Title: The Star
Writer: Alex Gansa (developed for american television by), Howard Gordon (developed for american television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa, Meredith Stiehm
Actors: Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Rupert Friend, Morena Baccarin
Plot: With Akbari dead, Carrie and Brody try to get to a safe house and wait for extraction.
